title: Kalvaria hmangaih lo lang kha
lyrics:
Kalvaria hmangaih lo lang kha,
Thangthar zelah an hril ang;
Chatuan pawhin a daih dawn lo,
Chawimawi tawk chauh mai a tan.

Van hla zingahte hian hei hi,
Lar ber a ni lo thei lo;
Tingtang thianghlim titul ber chu,
He thil hlu fak a ni fo.

Beramno thisen thih theih mak,
Thlarau tlan chhuah a natzia;
Seraf aw nem phak ai pawhin,
A la sang thin a ni a.

Thangthar tiau zat ral hnu pawh khian,
Fak hla hi tan ang a ni;
Ennawm mak thar, a thi hlu-an
A lang zel ang, a thuk si.

Chatuanin a inpek hlut zia,
Hrilh fiah zawh rual a ni lo;
Ngaih phak loh hun hnuin hei hi
Thar a la ni, eng tik pawh.

Aw mawi chhiar sen loh nei ila,
Fak tawk ka inring lo va;
Ka aw neih chhun lo mawi tawp se
Ka tih hle hi, chawimawi nan.
